ModMetaData.name: Allow Dead Animals
ModMetaData.author: Andrew Raphael Lukasik
ModMetaData.description:
Mod that auto-allows corpses for butchering.
Primarly made for people tired of constantly looking around for animals killed by wild predators to steal their meal.
Source code: https://github.com/andrew-raphael-lukasik/rimworld-mod_allow-dead-animals
